EmailTemplate.name: Check Orders
EmailTemplate.subject: Check order request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email. If this is the first order of checks on your account, or if any of the information on the checks will be changing, we will need to place the order for you instead.
Before we place this order, please confirm or make any changes to the following information as it will appear on the top of the checks:
We offer 2 styles of checks for ICCU: duplicates are $23.70 and singles are $23.15. Which would you prefer?
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day!
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
{!Case.OwnerTitle}
Idaho Central Credit Union
Eastern Idaho 208-478-3300
Treasure Valley 208-846-7000
Magic Valley 208-733-4777
www.iccu.com
Helping members achieve financial success.
